divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting out side and was watching the clouds roll over, I seen a small dark sphere overhead and under the clouds, the first thing I thought was a bird riding the wind and when I watched more I found there is no way a bird is going to hover there for that long. When it was hovering there I was watching the clouds go by it and it never moved, I grabed my binocs and found it was not a bird but a dark matalic ball and at that point I ran inside to grab my camera and wouldent you guess it was gone, seeing enough footage of the balls above mexico city it looked the same.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Folsom
There were no other sightings in Folsom on or around July 11th 2009
